Enum.Name: BITMAP_OPTIONS
Enum.Comment: Specifies how the bitmap can be used.

Field.Name: NONE
Field.Comment: The bitmap is created with default properties.

Field.Name: TARGET
Field.Comment: The bitmap can be specified as a target in ID2D1DeviceContext::SetTarget

Field.Name: CANNOT_DRAW
Field.Comment: The bitmap cannot be used as an input to DrawBitmap, DrawImage, in a bitmap brush or as an input to an effect.

Field.Name: CPU_READ
Field.Comment: The bitmap can be read from the CPU.

Field.Name: GDI_COMPATIBLE
Field.Comment: The bitmap works with the ID2D1GdiInteropRenderTarget::GetDC API.

Enum.Name: COMPOSITE_MODE
Enum.Comment: Specifies the composite mode that will be applied.

Enum.Name: BUFFER_PRECISION
Enum.Comment: This specifies the precision that should be used in buffers allocated by D2D.

Enum.Name: MAP_OPTIONS
Enum.Comment: This describes how the individual mapping operation should be performed.

Field.Name: NONE
Field.Comment: The mapped pointer has undefined behavior.

Field.Name: READ
Field.Comment: The mapped pointer can be read from.

Field.Name: WRITE
Field.Comment: The mapped pointer can be written to.

Field.Name: DISCARD
Field.Comment: The previous contents of the bitmap are discarded when it is mapped.

Enum.Name: PROPERTY_TYPE
Enum.Comment: This defines the valid property types that can be used in an effect property interface.

Enum.Name: PROPERTY
Enum.Comment: This defines the list of system properties present on the root effect property interface.

Enum.Name: SUBPROPERTY
Enum.Comment: This defines the indices of sub-properties that may be present on any parent property.

Enum.Name: INTERPOLATION_MODE
Enum.Comment: This is used to specify the quality of image scaling with ID2D1DeviceContext::DrawImage and with the 2D Affine Transform Effect.

Enum.Name: UNIT_MODE
Enum.Comment: This specifies what units should be accepted by the D2D API.

Field.Name: CUSTOM
Field.Comment: The color space is described by accompanying data, such as a color profile.

Field.Name: SRGB
Field.Comment: The sRGB color space.

Field.Name: SCRGB
Field.Comment: The scRGB color space.

Enum.Name: DEVICE_CONTEXT_OPTIONS
Enum.Comment: This specifies options that apply to the device context for its lifetime.

Field.Name: ENABLE_MULTITHREADED_OPTIMIZATIONS
Field.Comment: Geometry rendering will be performed on many threads in parallel, a single thread is the default.

Field.Name: NORMAL
Field.Comment: The stroke respects the world transform, the DPI, and the stroke width.

Field.Name: FIXED
Field.Comment: The stroke does not respect the world transform, but it does respect the DPI and the stroke width.

Field.Name: HAIRLINE
Field.Comment: The stroke is forced to one pixel wide.

Enum.Name: PRIMITIVE_BLEND
Enum.Comment: A blend mode that applies to all primitives drawn on the context.

Enum.Name: LAYER_OPTIONS1
Enum.Comment: Specifies how the layer contents should be prepared.

Enum.Name: THREADING_MODE
Enum.Comment: This specifies the threading mode used while simultaneously creating the device, factory, and device context.

Field.Name: SINGLE_THREADED
Field.Comment: Resources may only be invoked serially. Reference counts on resources are interlocked, however, resource and render target state is not protected from multi-threaded access

Field.Name: MULTI_THREADED
Field.Comment: Resources may be invoked from multiple threads. Resources use interlocked reference counting and their state is protected.

Enum.Name: COLOR_INTERPOLATION_MODE
Enum.Comment: This specifies how colors are interpolated.

Field.Name: STRAIGHT
Field.Comment: Colors will be interpolated in straight alpha space.

Field.Name: PREMULTIPLIED
Field.Comment: Colors will be interpolated in premultiplied alpha space.

Field.Name: bitmapOptions
Field.Comment: Specifies how the bitmap can be used.

Struct.Name: IMAGE_BRUSH_PROPERTIES
Struct.Comment: Creation properties for an image brush.

Struct.Name: LAYER_PARAMETERS1
Struct.Comment: All parameters related to pushing a layer.

Struct.Name: MAPPED_RECT
Struct.Comment: Describes mapped memory from the ID2D1Bitmap1::Map API.

Struct.Name: POINT_DESCRIPTION
Struct.Comment: Describes a point along a path.

Struct.Name: RENDERING_CONTROLS
Struct.Comment: This controls advanced settings of the Direct2D imaging pipeline.

Field.Name: bufferPrecision
Field.Comment: The default buffer precision, used if the precision isn't otherwise specified.

Field.Name: tileSize
Field.Comment: The size of allocated tiles used to render imaging effects.

Struct.Name: EFFECT_INPUT_DESCRIPTION
Struct.Comment: This identifies a certain input connection of a certain effect.

Field.Name: effect
Field.Comment: The effect whose input connection is being specified.

Field.Name: inputIndex
Field.Comment: The index of the input connection into the specified effect.

Field.Name: inputRectangle
Field.Comment: The rectangle which would be available on the specified input connection during render operations.

Struct.Name: STROKE_STYLE_PROPERTIES1
Struct.Comment: This defines how geometries should be drawn and widened.

Field.Name: transformType
Field.Comment: How the nib of the stroke is influenced by the context properties.

Struct.Name: CREATION_PROPERTIES
Struct.Comment: This specifies the options while simultaneously creating the device, factory, and device context.

Field.Name: threadingMode
Field.Comment: Describes locking behavior of D2D resources

Method.Name: CreateDevice
Method.Comment: This creates a new Direct2D device from the given IDXGIDevice.

Method.Name: CreateStrokeStyle
Method.Comment: This creates a stroke style with the ability to preserve stroke width in various ways.

Method.Name: CreatePathGeometry
Method.Comment: Creates a path geometry with new operational methods.

Method.Name: CreateDrawingStateBlock
Method.Comment: Creates a new drawing state block, this can be used in subsequent SaveDrawingState and RestoreDrawingState operations on the render target.

Method.Name: CreateGdiMetafile
Method.Comment: Creates a new GDI metafile.

Method.Name: RegisterEffectFromStream
Method.Comment: This globally registers the given effect. The effect can later be instantiated by using the registered class id. The effect registration is reference counted.

Method.Name: RegisterEffectFromString
Method.Comment: This globally registers the given effect. The effect can later be instantiated by using the registered class id. The effect registration is reference counted.

Method.Name: UnregisterEffect
Method.Comment: This unregisters the given effect by its class id, you need to call UnregisterEffect for every call to ID2D1Factory1::RegisterEffectFromStream and ID2D1Factory1::RegisterEffectFromString to completely unregister it.

Method.Name: GetRegisteredEffects
Method.Comment: This returns all of the registered effects in the process, including any built-in effects.

Parameter.Name: effectsReturned
Parameter.Comment: The number of effects returned into the passed in effects array.

Parameter.Name: effectsRegistered
Parameter.Comment: The number of effects currently registered in the system.

Method.Name: GetEffectProperties
Method.Comment: This retrieves the effect properties for the given effect, all of the effect properties will be set to a default value since an effect is not instantiated to implement the returned property interface.

Method.Name: GetMultithreadProtected
Method.Comment: Returns whether the D2D factory was created with D2D1_FACTORY_TYPE_MULTI_THREADED.

Method.Name: Enter
Method.Comment: Enters the D2D API critical section, if it exists.

Method.Name: Leave
Method.Comment: Leaves the D2D API critical section, if it exists.

Interface.Name: IDevice
Interface.Comment: The device defines a resource domain whose objects and device contexts can be used together.

Method.Name: CreateDeviceContext
Method.Comment: Creates a new device context with no initially assigned target.

Method.Name: CreatePrintControl
Method.Comment: Creates a D2D print control.

Method.Name: SetMaximumTextureMemory
Method.Comment: Sets the maximum amount of texture memory to maintain before evicting caches.

Method.Name: GetMaximumTextureMemory
Method.Comment: Gets the maximum amount of texture memory to maintain before evicting caches.

Method.Name: ClearResources
Method.Comment: Clears all resources that are cached but not held in use by the application through an interface reference.

Interface.Name: IDeviceContext
Interface.Comment: The device context represents a set of state and a command buffer that is used to render to a target bitmap.

Method.Name: CreateBitmap
Method.Comment: Creates a bitmap with extended bitmap properties, potentially from a block of memory.

Method.Name: CreateBitmapFromWicBitmap
Method.Comment: Create a D2D bitmap by copying a WIC bitmap.

Method.Name: CreateBitmapFromWicBitmap
Method.Comment: Create a D2D bitmap by copying a WIC bitmap.

Method.Name: CreateBitmapFromWicBitmap
Method.Comment: Create a D2D bitmap by copying a WIC bitmap.

Method.Name: CreateColorContext
Method.Comment: Creates a color context from a color space. If the space is Custom, the context is initialized from the profile/profileSize arguments. Otherwise the context is initialized with the profile bytes associated with the space and profile/profileSize are ignored.

Method.Name: CreateBitmapFromDxgiSurface
Method.Comment: Creates a bitmap from a DXGI surface with a set of extended properties.

Method.Name: CreateEffect
Method.Comment: Create a new effect, the effect must either be built in or previously registered through ID2D1Factory1::RegisterEffectFromStream or ID2D1Factory1::RegisterEffectFromString.

Method.Name: CreateGradientStopCollection
Method.Comment: A gradient stop collection represents a set of stops in an ideal unit length. This is the source resource for a linear gradient and radial gradient brush.

Parameter.Name: preInterpolationSpace
Parameter.Comment: Specifies both the input color space and the space in which the color interpolation occurs.

Parameter.Name: postInterpolationSpace
Parameter.Comment: Specifies the color space colors will be converted to after interpolation occurs.

Parameter.Name: bufferPrecision
Parameter.Comment: Specifies the precision in which the gradient buffer will be held.

Parameter.Name: extendMode
Parameter.Comment: Specifies how the gradient will be extended outside of the unit length.

Parameter.Name: colorInterpolationMode
Parameter.Comment: Determines if colors will be interpolated in straight alpha or premultiplied alpha space.

Method.Name: CreateImageBrush
Method.Comment: Creates an image brush, the input image can be any type of image, including a bitmap, effect and a command list.

Method.Name: CreateCommandList
Method.Comment: Creates a new command list.

Method.Name: IsDxgiFormatSupported
Method.Comment: Indicates whether the format is supported by D2D.

Method.Name: IsBufferPrecisionSupported
Method.Comment: Indicates whether the buffer precision is supported by D2D.

Method.Name: GetImageLocalBounds
Method.Comment: This retrieves the local-space bounds in DIPs of the current image using the device context DPI.

Method.Name: GetImageWorldBounds
Method.Comment: This retrieves the world-space bounds in DIPs of the current image using the device context DPI.

Method.Name: GetGlyphRunWorldBounds
Method.Comment: Retrieves the world-space bounds in DIPs of the glyph run using the device context DPI.

Method.Name: GetDevice
Method.Comment: Retrieves the device associated with this device context.

Method.Name: SetTarget
Method.Comment: Sets the target for this device context to point to the given image. The image can be a command list or a bitmap created with the D2D1_BITMAP_OPTIONS_TARGET flag.

Method.Name: GetTarget
Method.Comment: Gets the target that this device context is currently pointing to.

Method.Name: SetRenderingControls
Method.Comment: Sets tuning parameters for internal rendering inside the device context.

Method.Name: SetRenderingControls
Method.Comment: Sets tuning parameters for internal rendering inside the device context.

Method.Name: GetRenderingControls
Method.Comment: This retrieves the rendering controls currently selected into the device context.

Method.Name: SetPrimitiveBlend
Method.Comment: Changes the primitive blending mode for all of the rendering operations.

Method.Name: GetPrimitiveBlend
Method.Comment: Returns the primitive blend currently selected into the device context.

Method.Name: SetUnitMode
Method.Comment: Changes the units used for all of the rendering operations.

Method.Name: GetUnitMode
Method.Comment: Returns the unit mode currently set on the device context.

Method.Name: DrawGlyphRun
Method.Comment: Draws the glyph run with an extended description to describe the glyphs.

Method.Name: DrawImage
Method.Comment: Draw an image to the device context. The image represents either a concrete bitmap or the output of an effect graph.

Method.Name: DrawImage
Method.Comment: Draws the output of the effect as an image.

Method.Name: DrawGdiMetafile
Method.Comment: Draw a metafile to the device context.

Method.Name: PushLayer
Method.Comment: Push a layer on the device context.

Method.Name: InvalidateEffectInputRectangle
Method.Comment: This indicates that a portion of an effect's input is invalid. This method can be called many times.

Method.Name: GetEffectInvalidRectangleCount
Method.Comment: Gets the number of invalid ouptut rectangles that have accumulated at the effect.

Method.Name: GetEffectInvalidRectangles
Method.Comment: Gets the invalid rectangles that are at the output of the effect.

Method.Name: GetEffectRequiredInputRectangles
Method.Comment: Gets the maximum region of each specified input which would be used during a subsequent rendering operation

Method.Name: FillOpacityMask
Method.Comment: Fill using the alpha channel of the supplied opacity mask bitmap. The brush opacity will be modulated by the mask. The render target antialiasing mode must be set to aliased.

Method.Name: GetColorContext
Method.Comment: Retrieves the color context information associated with the bitmap.

Method.Name: GetOptions
Method.Comment: Retrieves the bitmap options used when creating the API.

Method.Name: GetSurface
Method.Comment: Retrieves the DXGI surface from the corresponding bitmap, if the bitmap was created from a device derived from a D3D device.

Method.Name: Map
Method.Comment: Maps the given bitmap into memory. The bitmap must have been created with the D2D1_BITMAP_OPTIONS_CPU_READ flag.

Method.Name: Unmap
Method.Comment: Unmaps the given bitmap from memory.

Method.Name: GetColorSpace
Method.Comment: Retrieves the color space of the color context.

Method.Name: GetProfileSize
Method.Comment: Retrieves the size of the color profile, in bytes.

Method.Name: GetProfile
Method.Comment: Retrieves the color profile bytes.

Interface.Name: IGradientStopCollection1
Interface.Comment: Represents an collection of gradient stops that can then be the source resource for either a linear or radial gradient brush.

Method.Name: GetGradientStops1
Method.Comment: Copies the gradient stops from the collection into the caller's memory. If this object was created using ID2D1DeviceContext::CreateGradientStopCollection, this method returns the same values as were specified in the creation method. If this object was created using ID2D1RenderTarget::CreateGradientStopCollection, the stops returned here will first be transformed into the gamma space specified by the colorInterpolationGamma parameter.

Method.Name: GetPreInterpolationSpace
Method.Comment: Returns the color space in which interpolation occurs. If this object was created using ID2D1RenderTarget::CreateGradientStopCollection, this method returns the color space related to the color interpolation gamma.

Method.Name: GetPostInterpolationSpace
Method.Comment: Returns the color space colors will be converted to after interpolation occurs. If this object was created using ID2D1RenderTarget::CreateGradientStopCollection, this method returns D2D1_COLOR_SPACE_SRGB.

Method.Name: GetBufferPrecision
Method.Comment: Returns the buffer precision of this gradient. If this object was created using ID2D1RenderTarget::CreateGradientStopCollection, this method returns D2D1_BUFFER_PRECISION_8BPC_UNORM.

Method.Name: GetColorInterpolationMode
Method.Comment: Returns the interpolation mode used to interpolate colors in the gradient.

Method.Name: GetDescription
Method.Comment: Retrieves the state currently contained within this state block resource.

Method.Name: SetDescription
Method.Comment: Sets the state description of this state block resource.

Method.Name: GetPropertyCount
Method.Comment: Returns the total number of custom properties in this interface.

Method.Name: GetPropertyName
Method.Comment: Retrieves the property name from the given property index.

Method.Name: GetPropertyNameLength
Method.Comment: Returns the length of the property name from the given index.

Method.Name: GetType
Method.Comment: Retrieves the type of the given property.

Method.Name: GetPropertyIndex
Method.Comment: Retrieves the property index for the given property name.

Method.Name: SetValueByName
Method.Comment: Sets the value of the given property using its name.

Method.Name: SetValue
Method.Comment: Sets the given value using the property index.

Method.Name: GetValueByName
Method.Comment: Retrieves the given property or sub-property by name. '.' is the delimiter for sub-properties.

Method.Name: GetValue
Method.Comment: Retrieves the given value by index.

Method.Name: GetValueSize
Method.Comment: Returns the value size for the given property index.

Method.Name: GetSubProperties
Method.Comment: Retrieves the sub-properties of the given property by index.

Interface.Name: IEffect
Interface.Comment: The effect interface. Properties control how the effect is rendered. The effect is Drawn with the DrawImage call.

Method.Name: SetInput
Method.Comment: Sets the input to the given effect. The input can be a concrete bitmap or the output of another effect.

Method.Name: SetInputCount
Method.Comment: If the effect supports a variable number of inputs, this sets the number of input that are currently active on the effect.

Method.Name: GetInput
Method.Comment: Returns the input image to the effect. The input could be another effect or a bitmap.

Method.Name: GetInputCount
Method.Comment: This returns the number of input that are bound into this effect.

Method.Name: GetOutput
Method.Comment: Returns the output image of the given effect. This can be set as the input to another effect or can be drawn with DrawImage.

Interface.Name: IImageBrush
Interface.Comment: Provides a brush that can take any effect, command list or bitmap and use it to fill a 2D shape.

Interface.Name: IStrokeStyle1
Interface.Comment: Extends a stroke style to allow nominal width strokes.

Interface.Name: IBitmapBrush1
Interface.Comment: A bitmap brush allows a bitmap to be used to fill a geometry. Interpolation mode is specified with D2D1_INTERPOLATION_MODE

Method.Name: SetInterpolationMode1
Method.Comment: Sets the interpolation mode used when this brush is used.

Interface.Name: ICommandSink
Interface.Comment: Caller-supplied implementation of an interface to receive the recorded command list.

Method.Name: Stream
Method.Comment: Play the command list into a caller-supplied sink interface.

Method.Name: Close
Method.Comment: Marks the command list as ready for use.

Method.Name: Stream
Method.Comment: Play the metafile into a caller-supplied sink interface.

Method.Name: GetBounds
Method.Comment: Gets the bounds of the metafile.

Interface.Name: IGdiMetafileSink
Interface.Comment: User-implementable interface for introspecting on a metafile.

Method.Name: ProcessRecord
Method.Comment: Callback for examining a metafile record.

Field.Name: DEFAULT
Field.Comment: Subset for used glyphs, send and discard font resource after every five pages

Field.Name: EACHPAGE
Field.Comment: Subset for used glyphs, send and discard font resource after each page

Field.Name: NONE
Field.Comment: Do not subset, reuse font for all pages, send it after first page

Field.Name: rasterDPI
Field.Comment: DPI for rasterization of all unsupported D2D commands or options, defaults to 150.0

Field.Name: colorSpace
Field.Comment: Color space for vector graphics in XPS package
